Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Bishop Ford, 115th, and Michigan due to street blockage at 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Bishop Ford, 115th, and Michigan due to street blockage at 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Lake Shore West/Belmont
ShortDescription: Eastbound 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sheridan, Cannon Drive, Inner Lake Shore and Diversey near Lake Shore West/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sheridan, Cannon Drive, Inner Lake Shore and Diversey near Lake Shore West and Belmont, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
